choices.name: Assign_to_expert_Home_Loan_Consultant_No_Answer
choices.choiceText: Assign to expert Home Loan Consultant (No Answer)

value.stringValue: Assign to expert Home Loan Consultant (No Answer)

choices.name: Assign_to_expert_Home_Loan_Consultant_Spoke_to_client
choices.choiceText: Assign to expert Home Loan Consultant (Spoke to client)

value.stringValue: Assign to expert Home Loan Consultant (Spoke to client)

choices.choiceText: FHB Assign to expert Home Loan Consultant (No Answer)

value.stringValue: FHB Assign to expert Home Loan Consultant (No Answer)

choices.name: FHB_Assign_to_expert_Home_Loan_Consultant_Spoke_to_client

Flow.description:
Flow Description: Triggers Marketing Cloud Comms for Bond Opportunities and is launched from the Wrap Up opportunity Bond Subflow which is ultimately launched from Wrap Up Opportunity H2 flow
Front-End Access: Work Opportunity button on the Opportunity page.

formulas.name: smartServiceTemplateSelection
formulas.expression: CASE({!theselectedTemplate}, "Awaiting OTP (No Answer)" , "Awaiting_OTP_No_Answer" , "Awaiting OTP (Spoke to client)" , "Awaiting_OTP_Spoke_to_client" , "Awaiting OTP (Follow-up)" , "Awaiting_OTP_Follow_up" , "Assign to expert Home Loan Consultant (No Answer)" , "Assign_to_expert_Home_Loan_Consultant_No_Answer" , "Assign to expert Home Loan Consultant (Spoke to client)" , "Assign_to_expert_Home_Loan_Consultant_Spoke_to_client" , "FHB Awaiting OTP (No Answer)" , "FHB_Awaiting_OTP_No_Answer" , "FHB Awaiting OTP (Follow-up)" , "FHB_Awaiting_OTP_Follow_up" , "FHB Awaiting OTP (Spoke to client)" , "FHB_Awaiting_OTP_Spoke_to_client" , "FHB Assign to expert Home Loan Consultant (No Answer)" , "FHB_Assign_to_expert_Home_Loan_Consultant_No_Answer" , "FHB Assign to expert Home Loan Consultant (Spoke to client)" , "FHB_Assign_to_expert_Home_Loan_Consultant_Spoke_to_client" , "No Template Selected" )

formulas.name: templateSelection
formulas.expression: CASE({!theselectedTemplate}, "Awaiting OTP (No Answer)" , "Awaiting_OTP_No_Answer" , "Awaiting OTP (Spoke to client)" , "Awaiting_OTP_Spoke_to_client" , "Awaiting OTP (Follow-up)" , "Awaiting_OTP_Follow_up" , "Assign to expert Home Loan Consultant (No Answer)" , "Assign_to_expert_Home_Loan_Consultant_No_Answer" , "Assign to expert Home Loan Consultant (Spoke to client)" , "Assign_to_expert_Home_Loan_Consultant_Spoke_to_client" , "FHB Awaiting OTP (No Answer)" , "FHB_Awaiting_OTP_No_Answer" , "FHB Awaiting OTP (Follow-up)" , "FHB_Awaiting_OTP_Follow_up" , "FHB Awaiting OTP (Spoke to client)" , "FHB_Awaiting_OTP_Spoke_to_client" , "FHB Assign to expert Home Loan Consultant (No Answer)" , "FHB_Assign_to_expert_Home_Loan_Consultant_No_Answer" , "FHB Assign to expert Home Loan Consultant (Spoke to client)" , "FHB_Assign_to_expert_Home_Loan_Consultant_Spoke_to_client" , "No Template Selected" )

Flow.label: MC Email Template Selection - Bond

recordUpdates.description: Updates the 'emailSendTrigger' checkbox, which launches journey in MC to send selected email
recordUpdates.name: Update_MC_Trigger_on_Opp
recordUpdates.label: Update MC Trigger on Opp

fields.name: loanApplicantsDoNotExist
fields.fieldText: Loan Applicants do not exist for this opportunity

fields.name: accountTxt_0
fields.fieldText:
﻿Account: {!accountFullName}

First Time Home Buyer: No

fields.name: campaignTxt_0
fields.fieldText: Campaign Type: {!Get_Campaign_Type.Type_of_Campaign__c} Campaign

fields.name: mainOnlyDocs
fields.fieldText: Below is the preview of the selected email template to send. Upon confirmation, this mail will be sent to: {!accountFullName}

fields.name: coOnly
fields.fieldText: Below is the preview of the selected email template to send. Upon confirmation, this mail will be sent to: {!Get_Co_Loan_Applicant.First_Name__c} {!Get_Co_Loan_Applicant.Last_Name__c}

fields.name: mainAndCo
fields.fieldText: Below is the preview of the selected email template to send. Upon confirmation, this mail will be sent to: {!accountFullName} and {!Get_Co_Loan_Applicant.First_Name__c} {!Get_Co_Loan_Applicant.Last_Name__c}

fields.name: mainOnly
fields.fieldText: Below is the preview of the selected email template to send. Upon confirmation, this mail will be sent to: {!accountFullName}

fields.name: mainOnlyDocs_0
fields.fieldText: Below is the preview of the selected email template to send. Upon confirmation, this mail will be sent to: {!accountFullName}

fields.name: coOnly_0
fields.fieldText: Below is the preview of the selected email template to send. Upon confirmation, this mail will be sent to: {!Get_Co_Loan_Applicant.First_Name__c} {!Get_Co_Loan_Applicant.Last_Name__c}

fields.name: mainAndCo_0
fields.fieldText: Below is the preview of the selected email template to send. Upon confirmation, this mail will be sent to: {!accountFullName} and {!Get_Co_Loan_Applicant.First_Name__c} {!Get_Co_Loan_Applicant.Last_Name__c}

fields.name: loanApplicantsDoNotExist_0_0
fields.fieldText: The email address has not been populated for the following customer: {!Get_Person_Account.FirstName} {!Get_Person_Account.LastName}

fields.name: capturetxt
fields.fieldText: Please capture the missing information in order to continue with the email send:

fields.name: emailBlankError
fields.fieldText: The Email field is required to continue with the email send.

textTemplates.name: chatterPostMessage
textTemplates.text:
<---- Customer Email Sent ---->
Template Selection: {!theselectedTemplate}
Sent To: {!accountFullName}
Sent From: @[{!$User.Id}]
Sent Date: {!sentTime}
